challenge.title: Alcoholics Autonomous - Anarchy and Alcohol
challenge.description: Nick Alcoholics Autonomous's Anarchy and Alcohol explores the harms of drinking and its effect on left wing subcultural struggles.
challenge.instructions: Use Archive.org E-Reserves to read Nick Riotfag's Anarchy and Alcohol.
